Apple.description: Crisp, sweet, and versatile. Apples are rich in fiber and antioxidants.
benefits: Supports heart health with soluble fiber (pectin)
May aid weight management by increasing satiety
Contains quercetin and vitamin C for immune support

Banana.description: Creamy and energy-dense fruit, perfect for pre- and post-workout snacks.
benefits: High in potassium which supports healthy blood pressure
Natural sugars and fiber provide sustained energy

Orange.description: Zesty citrus packed with vitamin C and refreshing juice.
benefits: Excellent source of vitamin C for immune health
Citrus flavonoids may support healthy inflammation response

Mango.description: Fragrant and juicy tropical fruit known as the king of fruits.
benefits: Rich in vitamin A for vision and skin

Cherry.description: Sweet-tart berries with deep red pigments (anthocyanins).
benefits: Anthocyanins may support recovery after exercise
Vitamin C and potassium for overall wellness

Green Apple.description: Tart and crisp, with slightly fewer sugars than sweeter varieties.
benefits: High in fiber for digestive support
Polyphenols may support healthy blood sugar response

Avacado.description: Creamy, nutrient-dense fruit rich in healthy fats.
benefits: High in monounsaturated fats for heart health

kiwi.description: Bright green, tangy fruit with tiny edible seeds.

Blue berry.description: Small, sweet berries packed with antioxidants.
benefits: Anthocyanins support cognitive and heart health
Low in calories, high in fiber

dragonfruit.description: Exotic cactus fruit with mildly sweet flavor and crunchy seeds.
benefits: Contains prebiotics to support gut health

Gouva.description: Aromatic tropical fruit with a seedy, sweet-tart interior (guava).
benefits: High in vitamin Câ€”often more than oranges

dates.description: Caramel-like sweet fruit from date palms, nutrient dense.
benefits: Contains minerals like potassium and magnesium
Popular for pre-workout and fasting breaks

Red banana.description: Red-skinned bananas with a creamy, slightly raspberry-like flavor.
benefits: Rich in beta carotene and vitamin C
